title: Quick Image Classifier Demo
description: Upload an image and see a tiny on-device classifier give a label. Demonstrates a Lovable-like builder flow mapped to static hosting.
instructions: This demo runs entirely in your browser and never sends images to any server.

title: Text Sentiment Mini
description: Type or paste text and get a sentiment score using a small client-side model or a public hosted API. Shows how Colab/Spaces pipelines look in practice.
runtime: client-first; falls back to hosted example if available
instructions: Try a sample sentence or paste your own. Seed controls available for deterministic outputs.

title: Vercel Deploy Preview
description: An embedded example of a static AI web app deployed on Vercel.
instructions: This loads the Vercel template in an iframe for quick exploration.
